name: Hot Blocks
description:
-Arrow keys to play

-Green blocks don't do anything but can be destroyed by hot blocks to get points

-When two hot blocks combine they create a purple block

-Purple blocks clog up space can't be destroyed once created.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 50. The theme was 'Delay the Inevitable'. In the game there's no way to keep playing forever so in the end you're just delaying the inevitable.
